MemoryInfobox.previous: Birds of a Feather (Odyssey)|Birds of a Feather
MemoryInfobox.location:
Dioskouroi Peninsula, Lakonia, Greece
Isle of Salamis, Attika, Greece

General_Description: '''Rumored Feather Location''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: One of the maps given by [[Xenia]] for the Golden Feather leads here.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra reached the location marked on one of the three maps and looted the chest.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Hmm. This is very nice... but I don't think it's what Xenia is looking for.''
She sailed to another rumored location and looted the area.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''This doesn't seem to be what Xenia's looking for... but it'll fill my purse nicely.''
After Kassandra arrived and docked on [[Isle of Salamis]] and found the [[Lighthouse of the Father of Ajax]] on the isle's southern tip.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Gods be good, I think this is the right spot.''
Kassandra noticed a ''pithos'' beside the beacon and looked inside it.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Hmm. Empty. Someone else had the same idea.''
Nearby, she found a forlorn [[lighthouse keeper]].
*'''Lighthouse Keeper:''' ''The gods will abandon us!''
As Kassandra addressed the man, he continued his wailing.
*'''Lighthouse Keeper:''' ''We are doomed! The gods will curse our names!''
<tabber>
|-|Tell me what's wrong.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It can't be that bad.''
*'''Lighthouse Keeper:''' ''Oh, it's terrible!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Tell me what happened.''
|-|Stop wailing!=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Stop that noise!''
The man was startled.
*'''Lighthouse Keeper:''' ''Ahh!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Better. Now, quietly, tell me what happened here.''
</tabber>
*'''Lighthouse Keeper:''' ''The lighthouse was plundered by bandits, the [[Terrors of Kyknos]]! I fear they've gone to the [[Mycenaean Tomb of Ajax]].''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll deal with them.''
*'''Lighthouse Keeper:''' ''Oh, no. There are too many of them!''

<tabber>
|-|I'll try to stop the bandits.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''They won't expect anyone to come after them. I'll sneak up and surprise them.''
|-|I'll crush them like insects.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Ajax is not the only one blessed by the gods. I'll crush these so-called terrors!''
</tabber>

Kassandra sought out the tomb and killed the bandits, finding the feather on the leader's corpse.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
